analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyis phan par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ji ltar khyod la bdag nyid phangs pa de bzhin du chos la yang gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Since Dharma is beneficial, therefore, just as you value yourself, so also should you value Dharma.

original: ji ltar shes rab las 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba de bzhin du mkhas ba rnams las kyang de 'byung ngo zhes mjug thogs nas 'byung bas ston to //
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab las 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba de bzhin du mkhas ba rnams las kyang de 'byung ngo zhes mjug thogs nas 'byung bas ston to //
translated: Just as all desired goals arise from wisdom, so also they arise from the wise. This is taught by the subsequent verse.

original: gtsang ba ni dben zhing dri ma med pa ste /
analyzed: gtsang ba ni dben zhing dri ma med pa ste /
translated: Pure means isolated and stainless.

original: chags pa la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chags pa la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is free from the impurities of attachment and so on.

original: byams pa ni byams pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa ni byams pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Loving means possessing love.

original: gang zhig de 'dra ba la dogs shing bag tsha ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig de 'dra ba la dogs shing bag tsha ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: That which generates doubt and anxiety in such a person.

original: chog shes pa ni rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: chog shes pa ni rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Contentment means being satisfied with what one has obtained.

original: snying rje ni pha rol sdug bsngal bas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje ni pha rol sdug bsngal bas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Compassion means being pained by the suffering of others.

original: tshul khrims ni spong ba bdun gyis bdag nyid dam /
analyzed: tshul khrims ni spong ba bdun gyis bdag nyid dam /
translated: Morality means the seven relinquishments.

original: sems can gyi don bya ba dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: sems can gyi don bya ba dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the benefit of sentient beings and the accumulation of virtue.

original: shes rab ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs de de kho na nyid yongs su dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs de de kho na nyid yongs su dpyod pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is the thorough analysis of reality in the state of meditative equipoise.

original: gang gi phyir chos de dag sgom par byed pa ni rtag tu bag yod pa yin pa de'i phyir de dag nyid ston pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos de dag sgom par byed pa ni rtag tu bag yod pa yin pa de'i phyir de dag nyid ston pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because those who cultivate those dharmas are always heedful, therefore they are called teachers.

original: de dag gi rang bzhin mkhyen par bgyis nas rjes su mthun pa'i don sgrub par mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin mkhyen par bgyis nas rjes su mthun pa'i don sgrub par mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Having understood their nature, you should accomplish the corresponding aims.

original: 'dod pa'i gnas thob par byed pas na lugs te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gnas thob par byed pas na lugs te /
translated: The system is so called because it causes the attainment of the desired state.

original: rgyas pa dang mdor bsdus te ji skad bshad pa 'dis so //üîΩgrub pa'i mchog ni sems can rnams kyi nang na'am /
analyzed: rgyas pa dang mdor bsdus te ji skad bshad pa 'dis so // grub pa'i mchog ni sems can rnams kyi nang na'am /
translated: By this extensive and concise explanation.üîΩThe supreme accomplishment is buddhahood among sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: Or, it is buddhahood among sentient beings.

original: bden pa'i dang tshul ni 'grogs na bde ba'am bde ba'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: bden pa'i dang tshul ni 'grogs na bde ba'am bde ba'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The way of truth is pleasant company or the nature of happiness.

original: bde ba skye ba'i rgyu yin pas na bde ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba skye ba'i rgyu yin pas na bde ba'o //
translated: It is happiness because it is the cause of the arising of happiness.

original: bsnyen dka' ba ni brda phrad par dka' ba ste zab pa'i phyir ro //üîΩkhyad du gsod pa ni gzhan dag @165a * //
analyzed: bsnyen dka' ba ni brda phrad par dka' ba ste zab pa'i phyir ro // khyad du gsod pa ni gzhan dag @165a * //
translated: Difficult to approach means difficult to meet, because of its profundity.

original: la brnyas pa'o //
analyzed: la brnyas pa'o //
translated: Disrespect means contempt for others.

original: de'i ched du byas pa'i gzhung gang yin pa de la yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de'i ched du byas pa'i gzhung gang yin pa de la yang de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That treatise which is composed for that purpose is also called that.

original: tshul dang ldan pa ni tshul shes pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul dang ldan pa ni tshul shes pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: One who is endowed with propriety is one who knows propriety, not another.

original: rang dbang ni shes rab rno ba'i phyir rang la dbang ba'o //
analyzed: rang dbang ni shes rab rno ba'i phyir rang la dbang ba'o //
translated: Independent means having power over oneself because of having sharp wisdom.

original: la la byams kyang nyes pa smra ba smra bas de'i phyir legs par smra ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: la la byams kyang nyes pa smra ba smra bas de'i phyir legs par smra ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Some, although loving, speak of faults. Therefore, it is said to be a good speaker.

original: legs par smra ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: legs par smra ba brjod pa'o //
translated: A good speaker is one who speaks well.

original: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i bya ba ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i bya ba ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: As appropriate means except for the duties of a king.

original: phan par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni phan par 'dod pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: phan par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni phan par 'dod pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Desiring benefit means by the very desire for benefit.

original: tshul khrims ni srung ba'am bsten par bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni srung ba'am bsten par bya ba'o //
translated: Morality means that which is to be guarded or relied upon.

original: phrag dog med pa ni gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la'o //
analyzed: phrag dog med pa ni gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la'o //
translated: Lack of envy means towards the excellence of others.

original: dogs pa med pa ni dge ba dag la 'jigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dogs pa med pa ni dge ba dag la 'jigs pa med pa'o //
translated: Fearlessness is the absence of fear in regard to the wholesome.

original: gang la gzhan don gyi nor yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la gzhan don gyi nor yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has the wealth of the benefit of others is called that one.

original: phongs par gyur pa ni nyam thag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phongs par gyur pa ni nyam thag par gyur pa'o //
translated: One who is in distress is one who is in a state of despair.

original: yongs gzung ni kun nas gzung ba'o //
analyzed: yongs gzung ni kun nas gzung ba'o //
translated: To take up means to grasp.

original: dor ba ni gtong ba'o//üîΩrin chen phrang ba'i tshig don rnams //
analyzed: dor ba ni gtong ba'o// rin chen phrang ba'i tshig don rnams //
translated: To cast off means to give up.

original: bdag gis rnam par dbye byas nas //
analyzed: bdag gis rnam par dbye byas nas //
translated: Having analyzed the words and meanings of the Ratnavali,

original: bsod nams cung zad gang bsgrubs des //üîΩ'jig rten thams cad mkhyen par shog / rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bsod nams cung zad gang bsgrubs des // 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen par shog / rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: whatever little merit I have thereby produced,üîΩmay all the world thereby become omniscient.üîΩThe commentary on the Ratnavali composed by the Acarya Aravam-prabha is completed.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bh'a dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bh'a dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: It was translated and established by the Indian upadhyaya Vidyakara-prabha and the great editor and translator Bande Pal-tseg.
